verses.verse: וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses אָמַ֜ר <WH559> 'a-Mar And he said עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> 'a-Leh Come up אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אַתָּה֙ <WH859> 'at-Tah you וְאַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> ve-'a-ha-Ron thou and Aaron נָדָ֣ב <WH5070> na-Dav Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <WH30> va-'a-vi-Hu, and Abihu וְשִׁבְעִ֖ים <WH7657> ve-shiv-'Im and seventy מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> miz-zik-Nei of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <WH7812> ve-hish-ta-cha-vi-Tem and worship מֵרָחֹֽק׃ <WH7350> me-ra-Chok. ye afar off

וְנִגַּ֨שׁ <WH5066> ve-nig-Gash alone shall come near מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses לְבַדּוֹ֙ <WH905> le-vad-Do alone אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> ve-Hem like לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor יִגָּ֑שׁוּ <WH5066> yig-Ga-shu; but they shall not come nigh וְהָעָ֕ם <WH5971> ve-ha-'Am neither shall the people לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor יַעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> ya-'a-Lu go up עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> im-Mo. with

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo came מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses וַיְסַפֵּ֤ר <WH5608> vay-sap-Per and told לָעָם֙ <WH5971> la-'Am the people אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> div-Rei all the words יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֑ים <WH4941> ham-mish-pa-Tim; and all the judgments וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> vai-Ya-'an answered כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and all the people ק֤וֹל <WH6963> Kol voice אֶחָד֙ <WH259> 'e-Chad with one וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and said כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All הַדְּבָרִ֛ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim All the words אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> na-'a-Seh. will we do

וַיִּכְתֹּ֣ב <WH3789> vai-yich-To wrote מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> div-Rei all the words יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֣ם <WH7925> vai-yash-Kem and rose up early בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> bab-Bo-ker, in the morning וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> vai-Yi-ven and builded מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> miz-Be-ach an altar תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat the foot הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> ha-Har; under the hill וּשְׁתֵּ֤ים <WH8147> u-she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten מַצֵּבָ֔ה <WH4676> matz-tze-Vah, and twelve pillars לִשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> lish-Neim both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> shiv-Tei tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach, And he sent אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- נַעֲרֵי֙ <WH5288> na-'a-Rei young men בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיַּֽעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu which offered עֹלֹ֑ת <WH5930> 'o-Lot; burnt offerings וַֽיִּזְבְּח֞וּ <WH2076> vai-yiz-be-Chu and sacrificed זְבָחִ֧ים <WH2077> ze-va-Chim offerings שְׁלָמִ֛ים <WH8002> she-la-Mim peace לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD פָּרִֽים׃ <WH6499> pa-Rim. of oxen

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses חֲצִ֣י <WH2677> cha-Tzi half הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> had-Dam, of the blood וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem and put בָּאַגָּנֹ֑ת <WH101> ba-'ag-ga-Not; [it] in basons וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and half הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> had-Dam, of the blood זָרַ֖ק <WH2236> za-Rak he sprinkled עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach. on the altar

וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach And he took סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> Se-fer the book הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit, of the covenant וַיִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and read בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> be-'a-ze-Nei in the audience הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; of the people וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and they said כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> kol All אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh All that the LORD נַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> na-'a-Seh will we do וְנִשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> ve-nish-Ma'. and be obedient

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> had-Dam, the blood וַיִּזְרֹ֖ק <WH2236> vai-yiz-Rok and sprinkled עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- accordance הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; [it] on the people וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, and said הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold דַֽם־ <WH1818> dam- Behold the blood הַבְּרִית֙ <WH1285> hab-be-Rit of the covenant אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which כָּרַ֤ת <WH3772> ka-Rat hath made יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> 'im-ma-Chem, in עַ֥ל <WH5921> 'al accordance כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim with you concerning all these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> ha-'El-leh. these

וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al Then went up מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> ve-'a-ha-Ron; and Aaron נָדָב֙ <WH5070> na-Dav Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <WH30> va-'a-vi-Hu, and Abihu וְשִׁבְעִ֖ים <WH7657> ve-shiv-'Im and seventy מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> miz-zik-Nei of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיִּרְא֕וּ <WH7200> vai-yir-'U And they saw אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְתַ֣חַת <WH8478> ve-Ta-chat and under רַגְלָ֗יו <WH7272> rag-Lav, and [there was] under his feet כְּמַעֲשֵׂה֙ <WH4639> ke-ma-'a-Seh work לִבְנַ֣ת <WH3840> liv-Nat as it were a paved הַסַּפִּ֔יר <WH5601> has-sap-Pir, of a sapphire stone וּכְעֶ֥צֶם <WH6106> u-che-'E-tzem and as it were the body הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim of heaven לָטֹֽהַר׃ <WH2892> la-To-har. in [his] clearness

וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- against אֲצִילֵי֙ <WH678> 'a-tzi-Lei And upon the nobles בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo did not שָׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> sha-Lach he laid יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do; not his hand וַֽיֶּחֱזוּ֙ <WH2372> vai-ye-che-Zu also they saw אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, God וַיֹּאכְל֖וּ <WH398> vai-yo-che-Lu and did eat וַיִּשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <WH8354> vai-yish-Tu. and drink ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, unto Moses עֲלֵ֥ה <WH5927> 'a-Leh Come up אֵלַ֛י <WH413> 'e-Lai to הָהָ֖רָה <WH2022> ha-Ha-rah to me into the mount וֶהְיֵה־ <WH1961> veh-yeh- and remain שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> Sham; there וְאֶתְּנָ֨ה <WH5414> ve-'et-te-Nah and be there and I will give לְךָ֜ le-Cha אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לֻחֹ֣ת <WH3871> lu-Chot thee tables הָאֶ֗בֶן <WH68> ha-'E-ven, of stone וְהַתּוֹרָה֙ <WH8451> ve-hat-to-Rah and a law וְהַמִּצְוָ֔ה <WH4687> ve-ham-mitz-Vah, and commandments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which כָּתַ֖בְתִּי <WH3789> ka-Tav-ti which I have written לְהוֹרֹתָֽם׃ <WH3384> le-ho-ro-Tam. that thou mayest teach

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom rose up מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses וִיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> vi-ho-Shu-a' Joshua מְשָׁרְת֑וֹ <WH8334> me-sha-re-To; and his minister וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al went up מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh and Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַ֥ר <WH2022> har into the mount הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God

וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to הַזְּקֵנִ֤ים <WH2205> haz-ze-ke-Nim unto the elders אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar And he said שְׁבוּ־ <WH3427> she-vu- Tarry לָ֣נוּ La-nu בָזֶ֔ה <WH2088> va-Zeh, ye here עַ֥ד <WH5704> 'ad against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after נָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> na-Shuv for us until we come again אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem; to you וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron unto you and behold Aaron וְחוּר֙ <WH2354> ve-Chur and Hur עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> 'im-ma-Chem, you מִי־ <WH4310> mi- [are] with you if any בַ֥עַל <WH1167> Va-'al to do דְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> de-va-Rim have any matters יִגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> yig-Gash let him come אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <WH413> 'a-le-Hem. about

וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al went up מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> ha-Har; into the mount וַיְכַ֥ס <WH3680> vay-Chas covered הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> he-'a-Nan and a cloud אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> ha-Har. the mount

וַיִּשְׁכֹּ֤ן <WH7931> vai-yish-Kon abode כְּבוֹד־ <WH3519> ke-Vod- And the glory יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַ֣ר <WH2022> har upon mount סִינַ֔י <WH5514> si-Nai, Sinai וַיְכַסֵּ֥הוּ <WH3680> vay-chas-Se-hu covered הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> he-'a-Nan and the cloud שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> She-shet it six יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> ya-Mim; days וַיִּקְרָ֧א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra he called אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I and the seventh מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch out of the midst הֶעָנָֽן׃ <WH6051> he-'a-Nan. of the cloud

וּמַרְאֵה֙ <WH4758> u-mar-'Eh And the sight כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> ke-Vod of the glory יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD כְּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> ke-'Esh fire אֹכֶ֖לֶת <WH398> 'o-Che-let [was] like devouring בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> be-Rosh on the top הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> ha-Har; of the mount לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> le-'ei-Nei in the eyes בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo went מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch into the midst הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> he-'a-Nan of the cloud וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al and gat him up אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> ha-Har; into the mount וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> vay-Hi become מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh and Moses בָּהָ֔ר <WH2022> ba-Har, was in the mount אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty י֔וֹם <WH3117> Yom, days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> La-ye-lah. nights פ Peh
